page.title: 02POPULATION.
page.content:
The population of the area has changed very little during the past one hundred years. There has been little building growth within the villages and this has caused the nucleus of the population to remain within the locality.
There are comparatively few young people in the villages.There are thirty children at Harlestone school, five less than in 1967.Most people are in the age range above thirty.
Few people work directly for the Spencer estate.Most work outside the villages,in Northampton or neighbouring towns.At least one commutes daily to London.
There are only 21 electors at Althorp
